title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama, featuring markdown, code highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers around Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using ollama-js and Vite, showcasing streaming responses.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client built with Python Prompt Toolkit and ollama-python.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks pairing Ollama with Open-WebUI, LibreChat, and RAG extras.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama with automatic CUDA/OpenCL driver selection.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm, and autocomplete using Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: FastAPI service demonstrating RAG with Ollama embeddings, ChromaDB, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama built with Finch HTTP and Jason, includes LiveView chat example.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for Go, Ruby, PHP, Dart, and more.
